Text: Do you have the first three episodes? Thanks for the downloads.
Thank you very much for Season 4 of Doc Martin, I'm living abroad and can't get this, I hope you don't mind me asking but just wondered if you had episode 3 please?  Thanks again for your kindness :)
Yes, it would be good if someone posted the first three of the fourth series. Not to be disparaging of the ones already posted but over a gigabyte is too much for a half-hour sitcom in standard def.
